Body.line0: Truncate TABLE C_W_Custom;COMMIT;insert into C_W_Custom select 'Shaanxi' as Province,( case when d.WCEL_RNC_ID in (3104,3105,3106,3107,3108,3109,3123) Then 'Xianyang' when d.WCEL_RNC_ID in (3112,3113,3114,3116,3117,3118,3119,3120) Then 'Yulin' when d.WCEL_RNC_ID in (3128,3129,3131,3132) Then 'Yanan' when d.WCEL_RNC_ID in (3144,3145,3146,3147,3148,3124) Then 'Baoji' when d.WCEL_RNC_ID in (3152,3153) Then 'Tongchuan' when d.WCEL_RNC_ID in (3156,3157,3158,3159) Then 'Hanzhong' when d.WCEL_RNC_ID in (3161,3162) Then 'Shangluo' else 'Other' end) as City,d.*,(select sysdate from dual) as UpdateDate from (SELECT d.co_gid as RNC_OBJID,b.co_gid as WBTS_OBJID,a.obj_gid as WCEL_OBJID,a.WCEL_LAC as LAC_ID,a.WCEL_RNC_ID,d.co_name as RNC_Name,b.co_object_instance as WCEL_WBTS_ID,b.co_name as WBTS_Name,a.WCEL_SECTOR_ID as Sector_Id,c.co_object_instance as LcrId,a.WCEL_C_ID as CI,a.WCEL_PRI_SCR_CODE as PSC,a.WCEL_UARFCN as UARFCN FROM (SELECT CO_PARENT_GID,co_object_instance,co_gid FROM CTP_COMMON_OBJECTS WHERE CO_GID IN (SELECT OBJ_GID FROM C_RNC_WCEL WHERE CONF_ID=1)) c, (select OBJ_GID,CONF_ID,WCEL_C_ID,WCEL_SECTOR_ID,WCEL_LAC,WCEL_RNC_ID,WCEL_UARFCN,WCEL_PRI_SCR_CODE from C_RNC_WCEL where CONF_ID=1 ) a, (select co_gid,co_object_instance,co_name from CTP_COMMON_OBJECTS where co_gid in (select obj_gid from C_RNC_WBTS where conf_id=1)) b, (select Co_Object_Instance,co_gid,co_name from CTP_COMMON_OBJECTS where co_gid in (select obj_gid from C_RNC_RNC where conf_id=1)) d where a.obj_gid=c.co_gid and c.CO_PARENT_GID=b.co_gid and a.WCEL_RNC_ID=d.Co_Object_Instance ) d;COMMIT;
